entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
